identity.name: Ã–H Wirtschaft JKU
identity.design_philosophy: The 'Anti-AI' Aesthetic - Breaking grid conventions, using bold typography, and high-contrast yellow/blue accents on a deep dark background.

gradients.blue_yellow_mesh: radial-gradient(at 0% 0%, rgba(2, 148, 203, 0.3) 0px, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(at 100% 0%, rgba(243, 170, 31, 0.3) 0px, transparent 50%)

typography.h1: text-5xl md:text-7xl font-bold tracking-tight text-white font-heading
typography.h2: text-3xl md:text-5xl font-semibold tracking-tight text-white font-heading
typography.nav_link: text-sm font-medium text-gray-400 hover:text-white transition-colors uppercase tracking-widest

header.nav_behavior: Hidden on mobile (Hamburger), Horizontal on Desktop

buttons.primary: bg-[#0294cb] hover:bg-[#027ba8] text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all shadow-[0_0_20px_-5px_rgba(2,148,203,0.5)] hover:shadow-[0_0_30px_-5px_rgba(2,148,203,0.7)]
buttons.secondary: bg-[#f3aa1f] hover:bg-[#d99616] text-black rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all

cards.default: bg-[#13161C] border border-[#272A34] hover:border-[#f3aa1f]/50 transition-all duration-300 hover:-translate-y-1 group relative overflow-hidden
cards.effect: Use 'Tracing Beam' or subtle inner glow on hover. No heavy drop shadows.

loader.description: Geometric shapes (Triangle/Circle) in Blue and Yellow morphing or rotating. Full screen dark overlay.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INITIALIZATION: The user requests a React Frontend. You MUST initialize a Vite + React project in '/app/frontend' if it does not exist.
2. THEME: Implement the DARK MODE described in 'colors'. Do not use light mode default.
3. STRUCTURE: Create the following pages: Home (/), Team (/team), Studium (/studium), Services (/services), Ceteris Paribus (/magazine), Contact (/contact).
5. COMPONENTS: Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions and scroll reveals. Implement a 'Loader' component that runs once on initial visit.

6. CONTENT: Since original content is inaccessible, use 'Lorem Ipsum' or realistic placeholders for descriptions. Use the Titles provided in 'functionalities_and_pages' (e.g., 'Bachelor Programs', 'Office Hours').
7. STYLING: Add the provided Google Fonts to index.html. Configure 'tailwind.config.js' with the custom colors and fonts.
8. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all text meets contrast ratios on the dark background. Use 'aria-label' for icon-only buttons.

do_not: Use gradients on text (unless for very specific emphasis).
must_do: Make the footer massive (py-20) with big typography.
